subject: Fashion
title: Disco Glam
description: A quick, practical guide to Disco Glam.

hook.text: Studio 54's dress code was simple: be extraordinary or wait outside. Fashion was your entry ticket.

buildup.text: Disco fashion featured sequins, wrap dresses, platform shoes, and fabrics that caught every light.

discovery.text: Halston defined the era: simple flowing shapes in luxe jersey designed to move on the dance floor.

twist.text: Disco was the first era where men dressed as flamboyantly as women. Gender lines blurred nightly.

climax.text: When disco 'died' in 1979, its glamour survived. Every sparkly party outfit traces to Studio 54.

punchline.text: The dance floor was fashion's most honest runway.

quiz.question: What gender norm did disco fashion challenge?
options: Men dressed as flamboyantly as women, blurring traditional gender lines
Women were required to wear masculine suits at disco clubs
